Name: Pattern Recognition - PE

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - PE
Text: Looking at U003 their adjusted score is 705 which might be enough to get approved where a Protected applicant with 705 would not For example if a Protected applicant had 705 they wouldnt get any adjustment so theyd be rejected but an Unprotected with 695 gets to 705 and is approved Thats a disparity

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
